import { Fragment, useState } from "react" import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import e from "cors"; function Login() { const [email,setEmail]=useState(""); const [password , setPassword] = useState(""); const onSubmit = async e=>{ e.preventDefault(); try { const body={email,password}; const response = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/login",{ method:"Post", headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}, body:JSON.stringify(body) }) console.log(response); } catch (err) { console.error(err.message); } }; return ( {/*

Login

setEmail(e.target.value)}/> We'll never share your email with anyone else.
setPassword(e.target.value)}/>
Don't have an account
*/}
Login
Email setEmail(e.target.value)}/>
Password setPassword(e.targer.value)}/>
Or Sign Up Using
SignUp
) } export default Login
